Experience.description: Developed an NMS Topology System, a robust tool designed for creating a variety of topology diagrams to meet diverse network management needs. The system features a user-friendly interface for designing and customizing diagrams. My responsibilities included developing an intuitive UI for diagram customization, building reusable components, managing state changes, and optimizing the UI to ensure both performance and scalability.

Developed an online shopping app website that utilizes various client-side tools to provide a seamless and engaging user experience. The website features a responsive design, intuitive navigation, and robust search functionality, allowing users to easily find and purchase products. My responsibilities included implementing robust search functionality and filtering options, ensuring seamless navigation and checkout processes, and implementing security measures to protect user data.

ProjectsDisplay.name: File Sharing Website(P2P)
ProjectsDisplay.description: Developed an application that leverages advanced web technologies to provide a user-friendly and efficient platform for transferring files without the need for external servers. The system includes real-time device discovery and peer-to-peer (P2P) connections for a smooth sharing experience. My responsibilities included developing a responsive web interface for real-time device discovery and file sharing, implementing secure P2P connections using WebRTC for direct file transfers, and creating a robust backend system to manage device connections and data transfer protocols.

ProjectsDisplay.name: Pacman Game
ProjectsDisplay.description: This Pacman game was implemented using GLUT and OpenGL. It features a classic arcade-style Pacman experience where the player controls the iconic Pacman character, navigating through a maze, collecting dots, and avoiding ghosts. The game includes animated Pacman movement, three lives, and four ghosts that chase the player. The game ends when Pacman loses all lives.
